comments.author: evilpies@gmail.com
comments.creator: evilpies@gmail.com
comments.text:
Obviously all stuff in the engine is designed to work with a stack. This manifests in error reporting functions taking a sp index etc.

To soften the way forward, we should use an abstraction like in IonMonkey with input() etc.
comments.raw_text:
Obviously all stuff in the engine is designed to work with a stack. This manifests in error reporting functions taking a sp index etc.

To soften the way forward, we should use an abstraction like in IonMonkey with input() etc.
